meanings.definition: A wicked or malevolent person or spirit.
meanings.sent1: The town was terrified of the shaitans who roamed the streets at night.
meanings.sent2: The villagers believed the old witch was a shaitans in disguise.
meanings.sent3: The children told spooky stories about the shaitans hiding in the forest.
meanings.sent4: His jealousy turned him into a shaitans, spreading rumors and causing trouble.
meanings.sent5: The shaitans whispered temptations in his ear, leading him astray.

meanings.definition: Evil spirits or demons in Islamic belief.
meanings.sent1: The imam warned the congregation about the shaitans tempting them away from prayer.
meanings.sent2: The holy man performed a ritual to protect the village from the shaitans.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat seemed to be possessed by shaitans, knocking things off shelves.
meanings.sent4: The storm raged outside, as if the shaitans were angry at the world.
meanings.sent5: The old tales spoke of brave heroes battling the shaitans to protect their people.
